text: Meitu Wink Personal Information Protection Policy
Latest effective date: 2022 [8] month [23] Day
label: Policy Change

text: As an operator of Meitu Wink, Xiamen Hongtian Chuangshi Technology Co., Ltd. and its related parties (that is, "we"), the following or "wink" or "Meitu Wink" will be strictly in accordance with the provisions of the law to protect your individualInformation and privacy security, this Wink personal information protection policy ("this policy") aims to explain to you that when using Meitu WinkApp (hereinafter referred to as "product" or "service"), what you should understand:
We will explain to you how you will handle your personal information in different scenarios in this product.
Under the basic mode, except for the required information required by laws and regulations, we will not process any personal information of your personal information.
You can refuse us to handle your other personal information, but this may cause us to be unable to provide you with corresponding services.

We will explain to you in detail in this policy that the types of your personal information have been shown boldly. The type of sensitive personal information is to bold the oblique body and the line logo.Essence
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect, store and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies
3. How do we transmit, share and disclose your personal information
4. How do we protect your personal information
5. Your rights
6. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
7. How can your personal information be transferred globally
8. Applicable laws and jurisdictions
Nine, how to update this policy
10. Our contact information
Eleven, appendix: authority application and application scenario list

We attach great importance to the protection of your personal information, and we are also committed to maintaining your trust in us. We promise to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information in accordance with the universal security standards in the industry.The whole process of installation, opening, browsing, use, and cancellation (hereinafter collectively referred to as "use") Wink is suitable for this policy.

The Wink client is the "Wink platform", which is suitable for this "Meitu Wink Personal Information Protection Policy". We promise that the maximum limit of your personal information collection and use does not exceed the scope of this "Meitu Wink Personal Information Protection Policy".
1. How do we collect, store and use your personal information
1. Register, log in and use Meitu account number
(1) [Register and logging in] When you use this product and service, we recommend that you register a Meitu account to use all the functions of the product and service;
For this reason, you need to provide mobile phone numbers (for real -name authentication) and create passwords and nicknames.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Register the Meituan account, you need to provide your mobile phone number (for real -name authentication) and create a password and nickname.

text: (2) If you have registered Meitu account, you can log in to WINK through the third -party account (such as Meitu Xiuxiu account), or you can log in with a third -party platform account.Will authorize WINK to obtain the public information on the third -party platform (avatar, nickname, and other information you authorize).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you log in with a third -party platform account, get the public information of your authorized third -party platform.

First Party Collection Information

This kind of information is the information that the service must be collected. After the collection, it is identified as the identification processing, which will not be used to identify any specific users.

First Party Collection Information

Meitu account can be logged in and uses the APPs of Meitu Company (including but not limited to Meitu Xiuxiu, Meipai, Beauty Camera, Poster Factory, etc.).For other apps and choose to use the registered Meitu account, the Meitu account will synchronize your nickname, avatar, region, gender, etc., etc.

text: If you don't want the above content to be synchronized, please choose other registration and login methods when you log in to other APPs of Meitu.
2. Provide you with network security and operational security guarantee

In order to ensure your account, network, operation and system security, and prevent fraud and Trojan viruses from fishing websites, in the process of using this product, we may collect your equipment information according to a certain frequency that realizes security requirements, including unchanged non -changingThe device logo information (refers to a string of characters compiled by the device manufacturer into the device to identify it. Android such as IMEI, Androidid, OAID, IMSI, ICCID, GAID, MEID, VAID, AAID, iOS suchThe "equipment identification information" referred to in this policy is the same as this definition), hardware serial number, and MAC address.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: Please understand that when you will be switched to the background of WINK and APP in the device screen, due to some equipment models and system reasons, the information collection behavior you used to use WINK related functions may not stop immediately, so as to withstand it, so as to put it, so as to do it, so as to do it, so as to do it, so as to do it, so as to do it, so as to do it, so as to do it.Causes short -term background information collection behavior.

First Party Collection Information

text: 3. Provide you with other related product functions and/or services

In order to achieve the following product functions and/or services, we may need to collect corresponding personal information from you. If you refuse to provide, you cannot use these specific services.

When you make a complaint with Wink, consult or appeal, in order to contact you or help you solve the problem, we may need you to provide personal information such as names, mobile numbers, emails and other effective contact information.

When you use Meitu formula, intelligent optimization and other functions, we will collect the rough and indirect portrait features (such as large categories: landscape, food, portrait, etc.) that do not recognize any specific individuals, and use algorithm to analyze picture features to help help helpYou choose more accurate formula and so on.

When you use the video beauty function, we will use Meitu face point technology to detect the facial features and contours in the photo or video you selected, and generate corresponding beauty effects according to the user's choice.

text: 2. How do we use cookies

In order to ensure the normal operation of the website, to help you get a more relaxed access experience, and send you the service content we provide for you, we will store small data files named Cookie on your computer or mobile device.
Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.
With the help of cookies, the website can store data such as your preferences to help you avoid repeating personal information and entering historical search content;
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: With the help of cookies, websites can store your preferences and other data to help you simplify operations.

text: At the same time, we may also use the above technologies to send, display, and push the service content we provide for you.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use the cookie to send, display, and push the service content we provide for you.

text: You can manage or delete Cookie according to your habits, and you can also remove everything stored on the computer, cookies.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can clear all the cookies saved on the computer.

text: See AboutCookies.org for details.
We will not use Cookie for any purpose outside the purpose of this policy.

Most network browsers have the function of preventing cookies. You can remove all cookies saved on the computer through the browser settings option, but if you do this, it may cause you to change it yourself when you visit our website yourself.user settings.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can clear all the cookies saved on the computer through the browser settings option.
